overview:
BouliBrandâ„¢ is a boutique marketing, communications and branding consulting firm that develops, creates and implements marketing programs for new businesses.

BouliBrand works directly with entrepreneurs to produce new communication platforms for business owners to use to target new markets domestically and internationally. BouliBrand (Bouli â€“ a derivative of Stroumboulis) is driven by Georgios Stroumboulis - a seasoned marketing professional with tangible business experiences across multiple industries and diverse cultures.
